Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Improve chapter display with grid/list view toggle and responsive design

- Add toggle between grid (card) and list (table) views with localStorage persistence
- Implement compact mode for cards: reduced height (280px vs 400px), smaller text, better spacing
- Create efficient list view with table showing title, description, date, and actions
- Add color indicator dots in list view for visual consistency
- Improve card grid to 2 columns in compact mode vs 3 in normal mode
- Add responsive action buttons in list view (View, Edit, Delete)
- Enhanced course selection card with gradient background
- Better control panel with active state indicators for view mode
- Maintain localStorage state for user''s preferred view mode
